sortUrl:
<js>
let banben = '2.0.0';
java.toast('\n构建分类中...');
let url = 'https://gitee.com/lyc486/yuedu2/tree/main';
let rr = java.ajax(url);
let nm = com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.read(rr, "$..trees[*].name");
let ur = com.jayway.jsonpath.JsonPath.read(rr, '$..trees[*].url');
let re = '';
for (let i = 0; i < nm.length; i++) {
    re += nm[i] + '::https://gitee.com' + ur[i] + '\n';
}
re+="主页::https://gitee.com/lyc486/yuedu2/tree/main/订阅/洛娅橙";
Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(100);
re
</js>
